title: Youth club
creator_credit: Norman Prouting, Ronald H. Riley, Film Producers Guild and Verity Films
brief_description: An account of the activities of youth organisations in Britain and how they help young people to bridge the gap between school and adult life, told through the story of a boy who is persuaded to join a youth club and who quickly discovers the variety of interests which it has to offer.
creator_credit_for_label: Norman Prouting, Ronald H. Riley, Film Producers Guild and Verity Films
